title: Q3 Financial Report Submission Due
message: ZESCO Limited Q3 2024 financial report submission deadline is in 7 days. Please ensure all schedules are finalised.

title: Overdue Dividend Remittance to GRZ
message: ZESCO Limited FY2022 final dividend remittance to Government of the Republic of Zambia is 30 days overdue. Immediate action required.

title: FY2024 Annual Report Approved
message: ZESCO Limited FY2024 Annual Report has been approved by the Ministry of Finance. The report is now published on the public portal.

title: Q1 2025 Board Meeting Scheduled
message: ZESCO Board of Directors Q1 2025 Regular Meeting is scheduled for 14 February 2025 at ZESCO House, Cairo Road, Lusaka at 09:00 hours.

title: ERB Compliance Submission Deadline in 14 Days
message: ZESCO Limited annual tariff review submission to the Energy Regulation Board is due in 14 days. Failure to comply may attract penalties.

title: Q4 2024 Budget Plan Submission Reminder
message: ZESCO Limited Q4 2024 budget variance report is due for submission to the Ministry of Finance by end of month.

title: Load Shedding Risk Escalation Alert
message: CRITICAL: Kariba Dam water levels have dropped to 14% capacity. Load shedding hours may increase to 18 hours per day. Immediate board briefing recommended.

title: Q2 Portfolio Review Pending Board Approval
message: Industrial Development Corporation Q2 2024 portfolio performance review requires board approval before public release.

title: Lumwana Copper Mine Investment Approved
message: IDC proposed investment in Lumwana Copper Mine expansion has been approved by the Board. Total investment commitment: ZMW 1.2 billion.

title: Q3 2025 Board Meeting Agenda Circulated
message: The agenda for the IDC Q3 2025 Board Meeting scheduled for September 2025 has been circulated. Please review and confirm attendance.

title: PACRA Annual Return Filing Due
message: Industrial Development Corporation annual return filing with PACRA is due within 21 days. Late filing attracts ZMW 5,000 penalty per day.

title: FY2023 Dividend Payment Confirmed
message: IDC FY2023 final dividend of ZMW 475 million has been successfully remitted to the Government of the Republic of Zambia.

title: Strategic Plan 2025-2029 Mid-Year Review Due
message: Reminder: IDC Strategic Plan 2025-2029 mid-year review is scheduled for August 2025. Divisional heads should submit progress reports.

title: Portfolio Risk Threshold Exceeded - Agriculture Sector
message: IDC agriculture portfolio exposure has exceeded the 25% concentration limit per the Investment Policy Framework. Review and rebalancing required.

title: Bank of Zambia On-Site Inspection in 30 Days
message: Bank of Zambia has notified ZANACO of a scheduled on-site regulatory inspection in 30 days. Full preparation and document readiness required.

title: New Bank of Zambia Digital Banking Directive
message: Bank of Zambia has issued Directive DBD/2024/001 on Digital Banking Risk Management. ZANACO compliance assessment required within 60 days.

title: Q2 2024 Financial Report Successfully Submitted
message: ZANACO Q2 2024 financial report has been successfully submitted to Bank of Zambia via the regulatory reporting portal.

title: AML Compliance Training Deadline - 10 Days
message: Mandatory AML/CFT refresher training for all ZANACO customer-facing staff must be completed within 10 days per Bank of Zambia directive.

title: ZANACO Board Meeting in 5 Days
message: Reminder: ZANACO Q1 2025 Board of Directors meeting is scheduled for 20 March 2025 at ZANACO Head Office, Cairo Road, Lusaka.

title: NPL Ratio Approaching Regulatory Threshold
message: ZANACO non-performing loan ratio is at 8.4%, approaching the 10% regulatory threshold set by Bank of Zambia. Enhanced monitoring activated.

title: Branch Expansion Plan Approved by Board
message: ZANACO Board has approved the Branch Network Expansion Plan 2025-2027 to open 20 new branches across under-banked provinces.

title: FY2023 Annual Report Overdue
message: Zambia Railways Limited FY2023 Annual Report is 45 days past the submission deadline. Immediate action required to avoid regulatory sanctions.

title: Safety Inspection Compliance Due in 21 Days
message: Zambia Railways Limited mandatory annual railway safety inspection by RTSA is due in 21 days. All safety documentation must be current.

title: Government Directive on Railway Rehabilitation Received
message: Ministry of Transport has issued Directive MOT/2024/DIR/008 requiring ZRL to fast-track track rehabilitation between Ndola and Kapiri Mposhi.

title: Ndola-Kapiri Track Rehabilitation Milestone Completed
message: Phase 1 of the Ndola to Kapiri Mposhi track rehabilitation project has been completed on schedule. 180km of track refurbished.

title: Fleet Maintenance Overdue - 12 Locomotives
message: 12 Zambia Railways Limited locomotives are overdue for scheduled maintenance. Risk of operational failure and service disruption is elevated.

title: Labour Union Strike Notice Received
message: Zambia Railways Workers Union has issued a 14-day strike notice citing unpaid salary arrears. Mediation meeting required urgently.

title: Environmental Management Plan Quarterly Update Due
message: Zambia Railways Limited Q3 2024 environmental management plan progress report is due for submission to ZEMA by 31 October 2024.

title: Copper Price Alert — LME Spot Above USD 9,500/t
message: LME copper spot price has risen above USD 9,500 per tonne, triggering ZCCM-IH commodity price monitoring threshold. Positive impact expected on Kansanshi and Lumwana dividend income for Q2 2025.

title: Dividend Receipt Confirmed — Kansanshi Mine Q4 2024
message: ZCCM-IH has received ZMW 480,000,000 dividend from First Quantum Minerals (Kansanshi) for Q4 2024. Funds credited to ZCCM-IH treasury account. CFO to initiate dividend distribution workflow.

title: LSE AIM Disclosure Obligation — Half Year Results Due
message: ZCCM-IH AIM Rules for Companies require half year results to be published within three months of the period end. H1 2025 results must be disclosed by 30 September 2025. Nomad to be notified.

title: Sustainability Report 2024 — Preparation Deadline
message: ZCCM-IH Sustainability Report for FY2024 must be completed and approved by the Board before the Annual General Meeting. ESG team to coordinate with portfolio mine ESG leads.

title: Board Skills Assessment Annual Review Due
message: Governance calendar requires the annual Board skills matrix assessment and gap analysis to be completed for ZCCM-IH. Results to inform the Nominations Committee recommendation for director appointments at the 2025 AGM.

title: FY2024 External Audit In Progress — KPMG Zambia
message: Zambia Gold Company Limited FY2024 external audit by KPMG Zambia is in progress. Two preliminary audit findings have been communicated. Final audit opinion expected by 30 April 2025.

title: Gold Dealer Licence Renewed Successfully
message: Zambia Gold Company Limited gold dealer licence has been successfully renewed by the Ministry of Mines and Minerals Development for a 3-year period (2024-2027). All licence conditions have been accepted.

title: Q1 2025 Board Meeting — Action Items Due
message: Follow-up action items from the Zambia Gold Company Q1 2025 Board Meeting are due for completion. CFO to submit FY2024 audited accounts, CEO to provide refinery expansion procurement update.

title: FY2024 Financial Report Submission Due
message: Zambia Gold Company Limited FY2024 audited financial statements are due for submission to the Ministry of Finance by 30 April 2025. Ensure KPMG Zambia audit is finalised in time.
